World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 8 日星期四 01:17:41 GMT 120
Five armed Haiti environment agents killed in clash with policeAt least five agents of Haiti's BSAP, an armed environmental agency that in recent years has evolved into a paramilitary body, were killed in a shootout with national police in Port-au-Prince on Wednesday, the police trade union told reporters. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:11:41 GMT K7MX23PEG5IQBA63UC472WAUBM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ Five-armed-haiti-environment-agents-killed-clash-with-police-2024-02-08/Reuters可持续发展社会与公平
Who is Anies Baswedan, ex-Jakarta governor running for Indonesia president?Ex-Jakarta governor Anies Baswedan is the dark horse in Indonesia's Feb. 14 presidential election. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:08:39 GMT AT3FOEIAZJIDJKMXWOYXTZVIBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-anies-enjoys-late-uptick-presidential-race-2024-02-08/Kanupriya Kapoor世界亚太地区
Indonesia's election in numbersIndonesia holds what will be the world's biggest single-day election on Feb. 14, which will also decide who will become president of the world's third-biggest democracy and its fourth most populous nation. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:06:25 GMT PJ4CU2G64ZM33GKN4HA2FWRZLE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-election-numbers-2024-02-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Who is Ganjar Pranowo, PDIP-backed Indonesian presidential hopeful?As a former governor from outside Indonesia's political and military elite, Ganjar Pranowo is banking on his populist appeal and folksy charm to stay in contention in the Feb. 14 presidential election, where he is struggling to make a mark. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:04:45 GMT CVIOYWFCSZKX3EVJX6KJPVM26Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-ganjar-faces-battle-overcome-jokowis-election-betrayal-2024-02-08/Martin Petty世界亚太地区
Why Indonesia's parliamentary election mattersAlongside choosing a new president, Indonesians will on Feb. 14 also vote for new lawmakers at the national and sub-national levels, in what will be the world's biggest single-day election. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:03:54 GMT V2V3Y7DUZVLOXE5RSOKV3GJDRA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/why-indonesias-parliamentary-election-matters-2024-02-08/Kanupriya Kapoor世界亚太地区
Who is Prabowo Subianto, ex-military commander running for Indonesia president?Dismissed from the military amid speculation of rights abuses, exiled in Jordan, and once banned from the United States over his alleged dark past, Defence Minister Prabowo Subianto is now in pole position to be Indonesia's next leader. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 01:02:00 GMT 2SPDTJL7UBPFXMMLY2SEJIGPXI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/once-disgraced-military-man-prabowo-eyes-indonesia-presidency-after-makeover-2024-02-08/Kate Lamb世界亚太地区
PNG leader Marape tells Australia economic growth brings securityPapua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape told Australia's parliament on Thursday his nation's economic growth would make Australia more secure, adding nothing would come between the two neighbours. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 00:39:08 GMT CV7DNKSGK5L5LEPP7P7MTWLUUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/png-leader-marape-tells-australia-economic-growth-brings-security-2024-02-08/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Exclusive: UN experts investigate 58 cyberattacks worth $3 bln by North KoreaUN sanctions monitors are investigating dozens of suspected cyberattacks by North Korea that raked in $3 billion to help it further develop its nuclear weapons program, according to excerpts of an unpublished UN report reviewed by Reuters. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 00:08:00 GMT 3AFCCS3CQVL53LRF7VIDZMZAVM https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/un-experts-investigate-58-cyberattacks-worth-3-bln-by-north-korea-2024-02-08/Michelle Nichols技术网络安全
Britain needs superwatchdog to monitor regulators, lawmakers sayA superwatchdog is needed as part of Britain's post-Brexit reset to better hold "increasingly politicised" watchdogs to account, though without impinging on their ability to act independently, a report from the upper house of parliament said on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 00:07:18 GMT HHO4VVAQGNO6BFLFZ2OBXW2ZT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britain-needs-superwatchdog-monitor-regulators-lawmakers-say-2024-02-08/Huw Jones世界英国
Gaza ceasefire hopes alive with more talks plannedMediators from the U.S., Qatar and Egypt scrambled to forge a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas in their four-month-old war in the Gaza Strip after America's top diplomat on a Middle East mission said there was still hope for a deal. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 23:41:37 GMT TXOLXIIF4RMADD4W4V4GP7CK6I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-ceasefire-hopes-alive-with-more-talks-planned-2024-02-07/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Humeyra Pamuk世界中东
Pakistan votes amid polarisation, militant attacks and economic crisisPakistan votes on Thursday in an election scarred by rising militant attacks, an economic crisis and a deeply polarised political environment, and many analysts believe no clear winner may emerge. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 23:38:08 GMT 3P6SO7D62NK5BLOJCVDHIN4JT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-votes-amid-极化-militant-attacks-economic-crisis-2024-02-07/Asif Shahzad, Gibran Peshimam世界亚太地区
